scripts.smoke: k6 run src/tests/smoke-test.js && node scripts/send-report.js Smoke
scripts.load: k6 run src/tests/load-test.js && node scripts/send-report.js Load
scripts.stress: k6 run src/tests/stress-test.js && node scripts/send-report.js Stress
scripts.spike: k6 run src/tests/spike-test.js && node scripts/send-report.js Spike
scripts.soak: k6 run src/tests/soak-test.js && node scripts/send-report.js Soak
scripts.all: npm run smoke && npm run load && npm run stress && npm run spike
